System

MOTD

  1. Clear login messages: 

    # echo '' > /etc/issue
# echo '' > /etc/motd
# reboot

Timezone

  1. Set universal timezone1): 

    # ln -sf /usr/share/zoneinfo/UTC /etc/localtime

Hostname

  1. Set hostname2): 

    # echo HOSTNAME > /etc/hostname
# reboot

1)
Timezone leaks: https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Data_Collection_Techniques#Fingerprinting_and_Anonymity.
2)
Hostname leaks: https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Hostnames.
